name: PowerCenter:Use Shared Folder
description:
Mapping should have at least a ratio number of shared folder/Total number of folder greater than X %. 
The X threshold is a parameter and can be changed at will.
Important note: this rule is triggered only for modules containing at least one repository. It means it won't show in a Dashboard when the CAST administrator creates one module per folder. An alternative to enable this rule is to create one module for each repository and their children.
output:
This report lists all Repositories with number of Shared Folder/Total Folder ratio lower than X %.
It provides the following information
Repository full name, ratio %
rationale: For speed of development, maintainability and evolutivity management it's important to share folders.
total: Total number of Folders, excluding Shared Folders
